tasks.title: Update README file with relevant information about repository
tasks.body:
Task
- Update README file seen on main page to have relevant and useful information regarding the repo

Deliverables
- Updated README file

tasks.title: ADRs for CI/CD
tasks.body:
Task
- Create ADRs for CI/CD decisions (such as use of Jest, ESLint, any integration tools, etc.)

Deliverables
- ADR files to cover all decisions made up to this sprint for the CI/CD pipeline

tasks.title: ADRs for Front End Decisions
tasks.body:
Task
- Create ADRs for front end decisions (such as use of Figma, Miro)

Deliverables
- ADR files to cover all decisions made up to this sprint for the front end

tasks.title: Update CI/CD Documentation Based on Updated Pipeline Implementation
tasks.body:
Task
- Redo the CI/CD pipeline diagram and documentation to be up to date with the implementation

Deliverables
- Updated cicd.md
- Updated cicd.png

tasks.title: Basic Dashboard
tasks.body:
## Pull Request Description

### Overview
This PR introduces a basic student dashboard with a side bar that has the links and videos components. In the main content area we have 2 container, first one is for upcoming deadlines and the second for for all the github tasks and calendar view.

tasks.title: Implement Task Management Features
tasks.body:
## Pull Request Description

### Overview
Implements comprehensive task management features including task creation, editing, deletion, and status updates with drag-and-drop functionality.

tasks.title: Add Video Player Component
tasks.body:
## Pull Request Description

### Overview
Adds a custom video player component with features like playback speed control, timestamps, and playlist management for educational content.
